did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Methodist Episcopal Church of Pittsford records, 1830-1886.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Methodist Episcopal Church of Pittsford (Pittsford, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Quarterly meeting conference minutes; trustee book and society meeting minutes and financial accounts; records containing names of preachers, traveling and local stewards, class leaders and members of classes; records of the Sabbath school including subscription lists; steward's book, official members' meeting minutes and quarterly conference minutes.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Quarterly meeting conference minutes (1830-1862); trustee book and society meeting minutes and financial accounts (1831-1871); records containing names of preachers, traveling and local stewards, class leaders and members of classes (1844-1865); records of the Sabbath school including subscription lists (1847-1877); steward's book, official members' meeting minutes and quarterly conference minutes (1847-1886).
